scripts.test:all: cd packages/pandapage && bun test:all && cd ../demo && bun test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: cd packages/parser && bun test && cd ../renderer-markdown && bun test && cd ../renderer-dom && bun test && cd ../pandapage && bun run test:unit
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/parser && bun run typecheck && cd ../renderer-markdown && bun run typecheck && cd ../renderer-dom && bun run typecheck && cd ../pandapage && npx tsc --noEmit --noUnusedLocals false --noUnusedParameters false && cd ../demo && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.test:e2e:headless: cd packages/demo && bun run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright.precommit.config.ts
scripts.precommit: bun run typecheck && bun run test:unit
